body_html: Note that this will not happen anymore because the variables are created inside ...Cell.__call__ and not in ...Cell.__init__, thus it does not need a scope for the construction of the cells, and it will handle the variable scope itself inside bidirectional_rnn thus you don't need to scope it yourself.
body_text: Note that this will not happen anymore because the variables are created inside ...Cell.__call__ and not in  ...Cell.__init__, thus it does not need a scope for the construction of the cells, and it will handle the variable scope itself inside bidirectional_rnn thus you don't need to scope it yourself.
body: Note that this will not happen anymore because the variables are created inside `...Cell.__call__` and not in  `...Cell.__init__`, thus it does not need a scope for the construction of the cells, and it will handle the variable scope itself inside `bidirectional_rnn` thus you don't need to scope it yourself.
